General.Name: China Master Logistics Co Ltd
General.Description: China Master Logistics Co., Ltd. operates as an integrated logistics company in China. The company offers logistics consulting services, such as marketing, inquiry and quotation, program design, cost accounting, container management, auxiliary stocking, booking agency, document operation, and other logistics process services, as well as coastal transportation, engineering logistics, transportation, and other logistics transportation services. It also freight forwarding, shipping agency, customs clearance, and depot services; project logistics; and bulk logistics. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China. China Master Logistics Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Qingdao Zhongchuang United Investment Development Co. Ltd.
